# Roadmap

### ASP.NET - Blazor

* ✅ Material UI
* ✅ Custom endpoint
* ✅ Server side rendering
* ✅ OIDC / Cookie authentication
* ✅ Proxying API
* ✅ GraphQL gateway
* ✅ Auto generated SDK
* ✅ Light / Dark theme
* ✅ I18N
* ✅ Feature management

### Express - Angular

* ✅ Material UI
* ✅ Custom endpoint
* ✅ Server side rendering
* ✅ OIDC / Cookie authentication (to 🧹)
* ✅ Proxying API
* 🛠️ GraphQL gateway
* 🚫 Auto generated SDK
* 🚫 Light / Dark theme
* 🚫 I18N
* ✅ Feature management

### Nuxt - Vue

* ✅ Material UI
* ✅ Custom endpoint
* ✅ Server side rendering
* 🛠️ OIDC / Cookie authentication
* ✅ Proxying API
* 🚫 GraphQL gateway
* 🚫 Auto generated SDK
* 🚫 Light / Dark theme
* 🚫 I18N
* 🚫 Feature management

### Nextjs - React

* 🛠️ Material UI
* ✅ Custom endpoint
* ✅ Server side rendering
* 🚫 OIDC / Cookie authentication
* 🛠️ Proxying API
* 🚫 GraphQL gateway
* 🚫 Auto generated SDK
* 🚫 Light / Dark theme
* 🚫 I18N
* 🚫 Feature management

### Yew - Rust (coming)

* 🚫 Material UI
* 🚫 Custom endpoint
* 🚫 Server side rendering
* 🚫 OIDC / Cookie authentication
* 🚫 Proxying API
* 🚫 GraphQL gateway
* 🚫 Auto generated SDK
* 🚫 Light / Dark theme
* 🚫 I18N
* 🚫 Feature management
